jd: From: Debasish Pattnaik, MRTECHNOSOFT d.pattanaik@mrtechnosoft.com Reply to: d.pattanaik@mrtechnosoft.com This role is ideal for a candidate with extensive experience in PL/SQL, Unix, Java, and JavaScript, Key Responsibilities:Lead the design, development, testing, and deployment of scalable web applications.Develop and optimize database queries, stored procedures, and functions using PL/SQL.Provide technical guidance to junior programmers, particularly in complex Oracle PL/SQL development.Automate backend operations via Unix shell scripting.Develop Java-based backend services and APIs, ensuring they are efficient and scalable.Qualifications: 10+ years of experience in full-stack development, with expertise in PL/SQL, Unix, Java, and JavaScript.5+ years of experience in SQL, Oracle PL/SQL, and working in large-scale systems.Strong Unix/Linux scripting and system administration knowledge.Java backend development experience, preferably with frameworks such as Spring or Hibernate.Expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.Familiarity with HTML5, CSS3, and RESTful APIs.Excellent communication and problem-solving skills, with experience working in Agile environments. ThanksDebasish Pattnaikd.pattanaik@mrtechnosoft.comwww.mrtechnosoft.com
